streams.name: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Electronics (PCME)
streams.description: The PCME subject combination is a stream in the science discipline at the pre-university level, popular especially among students with a strong interest in engineering, technology, and applied sciences. Replacing Biology with Electronics offers students exposure to circuit design, digital systems, and programming fundamentals, making this stream highly tech-oriented. It blends theoretical foundations in science and mathematics with practical, hands-on skills in electronics. PCME offers a technologically rich and versatile academic path, leading to robust careers in engineering, emerging tech, pure sciences, and research. It suits students who enjoy analytical thinking, problem-solving, and hands-on technical work, preparing them for future roles in an increasingly digital and automated world.

streams.name: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology (PCMB)
streams.description: The PCMB subject combination—Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and Biology—is one of the most versatile streams at the pre-university level. It equips students with a strong foundation in both life sciences and physical sciences, keeping doors open for careers in engineering, medicine, and pure sciences. Ideal for students who are undecided between medical and non-medical fields, PCMB offers the flexibility to explore a wide range of academic and professional options.

streams.name: Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Statistics (PCMS)
streams.description: The PCMS subject combination—Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and Statistics—is a niche but powerful stream at the pre-university level. It is ideal for students with a strong analytical mindset and an interest in quantitative analysis, problem-solving, and data interpretation. By replacing Biology or Computer Science with Statistics, this stream offers a solid foundation in mathematical reasoning, scientific principles, and statistical modeling, making it perfect for future careers in data science, research, and technology-driven fields.
